author: Dan Seifert
title: Ecobee’s new security camera doubles as an Alexa speaker
description: Ecobee has announced a new home security camera called the SmartCamera, as well as new sensors and motion detectors. The new products integrate with Ecobee’s smart thermostats to create a home security system called Haven.
